key.name: low-threshold
key.description: Send a notification when battery percentage drops at or below this value. Valid range: 1–99.

key.name: critical-threshold
key.description: Send an urgent notification when battery percentage drops at or below this value. Valid range: 1–99.

key.name: sticky-notifications
key.description: When enabled, notification banners stay on screen until the user explicitly dismisses them. When disabled, banners auto-hide after a few seconds (the notification still remains in the panel).
